issue.title: [CF 964] Lua Error when editing config
issue.body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
I am not 100% sure I did. The error poped up when I was creating a internal cooldown icon.

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)
7.0.1-5-g9b3bf91

Do you have an error log of what happened?
